name: Abducted
blurb: Abducted by aliens and taken thousands of light years from home, you have one ultimate goal: Escape.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your contribution! For your generous donation of $5 you are preordering the first episode of Abducted on your platform of choice and we thank you for your support! Know that you are helping to make Abducted a better game!

Thank you very much! Not only will you be preordering the first 6 episodes on the platform of your choice (a $30 value), we will also get you into our private beta testing program and access to our private development forum, giving you a sneak peek at Abducted as it is developed. Help us shape the experience with your input, and playtest builds early!

Your copy of the first season (all 6 episodes) on the platform of your choice. You will be part of our private beta and get developer forum access! You will also get a remastered copy of the game soundtrack in high quality MP3, AAC or ogg format (your choice, a $40 value at least!). All of us at Sunside sincerely thank you for your contribution!

The platform combo deal! You'll be preordering all 6 episodes on any 2 platforms of your choice (a $50 value at least) such as Mac/iOS or PC/Android.  This reward was added by request of our supporters! We will also get you into our private beta testing program and access to our private development forum, giving you a sneak peek at Abducted as it is developed. Help us shape the experience with your input, and playtest builds early!
In addition to all of the episodes, private beta access and a digital copy of the remastered soundtrack, you will also have your name in the credits as a Kickstarter contributor!  Thank you so much!

Get some swag! In addition to all the previous online and digital rewards, you will get either an Abducted mouse pad or t-shirt, your choice! To sweeten this deal, we will also send you a professionally printed CD of the game soundtrack.\r\n\r\nAnd to really sweeten the deal, we'll give you a chance to shape some Arm conversation!  We'll work with you to include any single topic or database entry in the game, you can get creative!  We can do this as an easter egg or it can be serious fiction.  Within reason of course, nothing vulgar or inappropriate to the design of the game, but we'll work with you on that and make it fun!

All of the previous rewards and you get all 3 swag items: mouse pad, t-shirt and CD soundtrack. And you will be part of a Top Contributor section in the credits, receiving special thanks and be allowed to include any one-line message you would like. And at your request any and all of your swag items will be signed by the developers of Abducted!

This is the ultimate swag reward! In addition to everything else, you will also receive a DRM-free boxed copy of Abducted Episode 1 on DVD, in professional full color print. Inside we will include a special thank you card and the enclosure will be signed by the developers. Additionally, the DVD will include bonus materials, screenshots, renderings, early development work and music/sound fx not available anywhere else. The DVD will ship in both Mac/PC format compatibility.

Be in the game! In addition to ALL of the previous digital, online and printed rewards, you will get your face in the game (or the face of a loved one, with their permission) as a character! We'll work directly with you to get the photography we need, and we'll show you early progress of your character and how your likeness will be used. You will have our ear and be able to communicate with us one-on-one as we make you part of the supporting cast! Additionally this will elevate your credit in the game to an actor and contributor. We couldn't possibly thank you enough, but thank you!

The Figurine Reward. All previous rewards plus one hand painted, resin cast figurine of Eve or The Tormentor, your choice of a major character from Abducted. Each character will be 6-8" in height (final size TBD) and professionally painted by an experienced and talented miniature artist. This is the coolest real world item we could come up with, and would be beyond dope to have sitting on your shelf along with the signed Abducted box and DVD, CD, and your likeness in the game for all time!

This is the Everything Reward, meaning you get it all. You will get all previous rewards, at least one of each item OR any reasonable combination of items you want. Don't want the CD but want 2 DVD's instead? No problem (note: within Kickstarter rules too, we cannot offer bulk items). Everything will be signed the way you want. And you will get both figurines: Eve and The Tormentor with special 'skins', custom painted with an alternate look you choose from. This is the ultimate reward, and as such you will have your name (or a word or phrase of your choice) not just in a special place in the credits but also added to the game itself. I will personally contact you and work with you to make sure everything is completed to your satisfaction. Thank you!
